simple.xml

Class XMLDoc

  • java.lang.Object
    • simple.xml.XMLDoc
  • Deprecated. 
    11/2010 Replaced by InlineLooseParser

    public final class XMLDoc
extends Object

    Title: XMLDoc

    Description: Simple Generic XML Parser


    Created: 2004
    Version:
    2.1 Note that this version only supports tag attributes self-closing tags and tags with sub-tags. Next release will support tags with text contents. Does not validate!!!
    Author:
    Kenneth Pierce

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      XMLDoc(File file)

      Deprecated.

      Deprecated. 
       

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getParam(String tree, String param)
      Deprecated. 
      Follows the tree specified in tree and gets param.
      Format of tree:
      tagName;index/subtagName;index
      where tagName is non-null and index>=0.
      Example:
      getParam("mime;0/text;3/type;0", "mimeType");
      The above can also be written as:
      getParam("mime/text;3/type", "mimeType");
      String getParam(String tag, String param, int offset)
      Deprecated. 
      Recursively searches the main document for tag to get the value param skipping offset tags.
      int getSubNum(String tag, int offset)
      Deprecated. 
      Recursively searches the document for tag skipping offset similar tags.
      boolean isParsing()
      Deprecated. 
       
      void parse()
      Deprecated. 
      This is the big function that parses the set XML file.
      String print()
      Deprecated. 
      Prints the current document in an easy to read format.
      For debuging purposes only.
      void waitFor()
      Deprecated. 
      Blocks until parse() function is done working.

      • getParam

        public String getParam(String tree,
              String param)
        Deprecated. 
        Follows the tree specified in tree and gets param.
        Format of tree:
        tagName;index/subtagName;index
        where tagName is non-null and index>=0.
        Example:
        getParam("mime;0/text;3/type;0", "mimeType");
        The above can also be written as:
        getParam("mime/text;3/type", "mimeType");
        Parameters:
        tree - Tree to follow
        param - Parameter to get
        Returns:
        Value of param if found, null otherwise

      • getParam

        public String getParam(String tag,
              String param,
              int offset)
        Deprecated. 
        Recursively searches the main document for tag to get the value param skipping offset tags.
        Parameters:
        tag - Tag to find.
        param - Attribute of tag to get.
        offset - Number of tags to skip.
        Returns:
        The value of param or null if tag or param isn't found.

      • getSubNum

        public int getSubNum(String tag,
            int offset)
        Deprecated. 
        Recursively searches the document for tag skipping offset similar tags.
        Parameters:
        tag -
        offset -
        Returns:
        The number of subtags tag has. -1 if tag isn't found.
